summary: THE ENGINE FAILED IN THE MIDDLE OF A BUSY ROAD.  THE LOW ENGINE POWER LIGHT CAME ON, FOLLOWED BY SERVICE ENGINE SOON LIGHT AND THEN THE VEHICLE LOST ALL POWER. TOWED TO THE DEALER. PROBLEM WAS CYLINDER SLEEVE FLEW OUT AND DAMAGED THE ENGINE. REQUIRED A NEW ENGINE. VEHICLE HAD 15000 MILES ON. GM OFFERED TO DO WHATEVER IT TAKES TO KEEP ME HAPPY AND LOYAL. I REQUEST FROM THEM TO CREDIT ALL THE PAYMENTS I MADE ON THIS VEHICLE TO THE PURCHASE OF 2003 ESCALADE . THEY COUNTER OFFERED AN EXTENDED WARRANTY FOR 60,000 MILES. I SAID NO. I AM BUYING A LAND CRUISER THIS WEEKEND. NO MORE GM CARS. THE WORST. INCLUDING THE HIGH END CADILLAC . JUST REVIEW THE COMPLAINTS ON THIS SITE AND YOU WILL SEE FOR YOUR SELF.
